name: 尖刺
note:
<Custom React Effect>
// Check to see if any physical damage is dealt.
if (value > 0 && this.isDamage()) {
  // Sets the Recoil Rate to 15%.
  var rate = 2;
  // Determines the amount of recoil damage dealt.
  var recoil = value * rate;
  // Sets the DEF bonus rate to 25%.
  var rate = 10;
  // Determines the amount of bonus damage dealt.
  var bonus = target.def * rate;
  // Rounds up the bonus damage and recoil damage.
  var dmg = Math.ceil(bonus + recoil) * 2;
  // Makes the attacker lose damage equal to the dmg variable.
  user.gainHp(-1 * dmg);
  // Check to see if the attacker is dead.
  if (user.isDead()) {
    // If the attacker is dead, make it collapse.
    user.performCollapse();
  }
}
</Custom React Effect>

name: 痛苦分担
note:
<Reapply Reset Turns>
<Custom React Effect>
if (this.isDamage()){

var ppl = 0;
var i = 0;
//check if allies are infected
for (i = 0; i < $gameParty._actors.length; i ++){
  if ($gameActors._data[$gameParty._actors[i]].isStateAffected(47)){
    ppl ++;
  }
}
//check if troops are infected
for (i = 0; i < $gameTroop._enemies.length; i ++){
  if ($gameTroop._enemies[i].isStateAffected(47)){
    ppl ++;
  }
}
//do damage to other troop
//also check that the guy that takes dmg doesn't take it second times
for (i = 0; i < $gameTroop._enemies.length; i ++){
  if ($gameTroop._enemies[i] !== b && $gameTroop._enemies[i].isStateAffected(47)){
    $gameTroop._enemies[i].gainHp(Math.floor(value / ppl) * -1);
  }
  if ($gameTroop._enemies[i].isDead()) {
    $gameTroop._enemies[i].performCollapse();
  }
}
//do damage to allies
for (i = 0; i < $gameParty._actors.length; i ++){
  if ($gameActors._data[$gameParty._actors[i]] !== b && $gameActors._data[$gameParty._actors[i]].isStateAffected(47)){
    $gameActors._data[$gameParty._actors[i]].gainHp(Math.floor(value / ppl) * -1);
  }
  if ($gameActors._data[$gameParty._actors[i]].isDead()) {
    $gameActors._data[$gameParty._actors[i]].performCollapse();
  }
}
//set damage to the target
value = Math.round(value/ppl);

}
</Custom React Effect>

<Custom Turn Start Effect>
var store = [];
var things = a._actions;
var count = 0;
console.log(things);
for (var i = 0; i < things.length; i ++){
store.push(things[i]._item._itemId);
}
for (var i = 0; i < store.length; i ++){
if (store[i] === 127){
count ++;
}
}
if (count === 0){
a.removeState(55);
}
</Custom Turn Start Effect>
<Custom Conclude Effect>
a.addState(55);
a.setStateTurns(55, a.stateTurns(55) - 1);
</Custom Conclude Effect>
<Reapply Add Turns>

message1: 的魔法可以使用两次了！
name: 两次魔法
note:
<Reapply Add Turns>
<Custom Turn Start Effect>
var dupe = [];
for (var i = 0; i < user._actions.length; i ++){
  var action = user._actions[i];
  if (action && action.isSkill()) {
    // Get the skill used for that action.
    var skill = action.item();
    // Check if the user can pay the skill cost.
    if (user.canPaySkillCost(skill)) {
       dupe.push(action);
    }
  }
}
user._actions = user._actions.concat(dupe);
</Custom Turn Start Effect>

name: 备用HP
note:
<Reapply Add Turns>
<Custom Conclude Effect>
a.addState(96);
a.setStateTurns(96, a.stateTurns(96) - 1);
</Custom Conclude Effect>
<Custom Respond Effect>
if (b.hp < b.mhp){
  var differ = b.mhp - b.hp;
  if (b.stateTurns(96) > differ){
    b.gainHp(differ);
    b.setStateTurns(96, b.stateTurns(96) - differ);0
  } else {
    b.gainHp(b.stateTurns(96));
    b.removeState(96);
  }
}
</Custom Respond Effect>
<Custom Turn End Effect>
if (a.hp < a.mhp){
var differ = a.mhp - a.hp;
if (a.stateTurns(96) > differ){
a.gainHp(differ);
a.setStateTurns(96, a.stateTurns(96) - differ);0
} else {
a.gainHp(a.stateTurns(96));
a.removeState(96);
}
}
</Custom Turn End Effect>

name: 南翔被动
note:
<Custom Turn End Effect>
//所有角色有点燃则引爆
var igniteCount = 0;
for (i = 0; i < $gameParty._actors.length; i ++){
  var actor = $gameActors._data[$gameParty._actors[i]];
  if (actor._hp === 0 || actor.isStateAffected(30)){
    igniteCount ++;
  }
}
if (igniteCount >= 4){
user.forceAction(281, 0);
BattleManager.forceAction(user);
}else if (Math.randomInt(5) === 0){
user.forceAction(281, 0);
BattleManager.forceAction(user);
}
//清除开关状态
$gameSwitches._data[210] = false;
$gameSwitches._data[211] = false;
</Custom Turn End Effect>
